functions.tag: {CustomModelData:2,display:{Name:'{"translate":"泉から出てきた銀の斧","color":"#D9D9D9","bold":true,"italic":false}',Lore:['[{"text":"❖ ","color":"","italic":false},{"translate":"%1$s%2$s(IV)","color":"white","with":[{"translate":"魔吸の"},{"translate":"刻印"}]}]','{"translate":"とある泉の中から現れる","color":"#9DFFFF","italic":false}','{"translate":"女神から貰えるとされる","color":"#9DFFFF","italic":false}','{"translate":"不思議な斧","color":"#9DFFFF","italic":false}']},Engraving:{EnchantID:"魔吸",Tier:4},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.max_health",Name:"カスタム",Amount:0.1,Operation:2,UUID:[I;11,0,0,12],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.knockback_resistance",Name:"カスタム",Amount:0.2,Operation:1,UUID:[I;11,0,0,21],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"カスタム",Amount:120,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,0,40],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"カスタム",Amount:0.05,Operation:1,UUID:[I;11,0,0,51],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"デフォルト",Amount:21,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,1,40],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"デフォルト",Amount:0.9,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,1,50],Slot:"mainhand"}]}
